description.en: An exquisitely crafted weapon found in The Wilds. It hums with power.
description.ar: An exquisitely crafted weapon found in The Wilds. It hums with power.
description.br: An exquisitely crafted weapon found in The Wilds. It hums with power.
description.cns: 在荒野中发现的制作精良的武器。它充满了力量。国人首把卢萨卡武器由Cassjiao，發財，胡图图，琦琦i，Vickers，小尘，逍遥，Yukkie团队获得。
description.de: Eine exquisit gefertigte Waffe, die in der Wildnis gefunden wurde. Sie vibriert vor Kraft.
description.fi: An exquisitely crafted weapon found in The Wilds. It hums with power.
description.fil: An exquisitely crafted weapon found in The Wilds. It hums with power.
description.fr: Une arme finement forgée au cœur de Désiréa. Elle vibre de puissance.

description.jp: 荒野で見られる精巧に作られた武器。力強くハミングします。

description.sp: Arma exquisitamente elaborada que se encuentra en Los Salvajes. Zumba poder.
